summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Massachusetts Registry of Vital Records, commanding them to appear and produce a birth certificate for an individual (whose name is redacted) in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena is signed by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)) for which this subpoena is issued.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued this subpoena.

connections.description: Strauss, as U.S. Attorney, is prosecuting the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Birth Certificate Production
events.description: The Massachusetts Registry of Vital Records is commanded to appear in court to produce a birth certificate for a redacted individual as part of the Maxwell case.

locations: Registry of Vital Records and Statistics, 150 Mt. Vernon Street, 1st Floor, Dorchester, MA 02125
United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Manhattan, New York, NY
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office subpoenaed a birth certificate for a redacted individual (referred to as 'N.' and with a DOR number) as part of the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal prosecution.
The subpoena was issued by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss on July 19, 2021, commanding an appearance on November 29, 2021.
The document indicates ongoing investigative or evidentiary gathering efforts by prosecutors in the Maxwell case well into 2021.
The target of the subpoena is a state vital records office in Massachusetts, suggesting the individual whose birth certificate is sought may have been born or have records in that state.
